subject: New hydraulic damoers
description_text:
Hello 
 
 
 
 
 Do the new two hydraulic dampers fit the old pedals?  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Regards  
 
 Aidan

conversations.body_text: Hi Aidan,    They are fully compatible. Here is the download link for the upgrade package:  https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit
